actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 1:00 p.m. on July 30, 2024.

The House received a communication from Nicholas A. Ciarlante, Deputy Chief Administrative Officer, Office of the Sergeant at Arms. Pursuant to Rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives, Mr. Ciarlante notified the House that he had been served with a subpoena for documents and testimony issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, and that after consultation with the Office of General Counsel, he had determined that compliance with the subpoena is consistent with the privileges and rights of the House.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. John Kellogg, Christ Church Washington Parish, Washington D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Cliff Bentz to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
